entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
